event.description:
A short while ago, our company’s water jet chopping machine sold to Belarus has been shipped, this machine uses the actual CHINA RAILWAY Express to Belarus. Using the implementation of the “The Belt as well as Road” strategy, the CHINA RAILWAY Express being a “The Belt and The Road” visitors ambassador, the number of procedures is increasing, and the insurance is growing. At the stop of March 2019, the number of CHINA RAILWAY Express was more than 14, 000, which basically achieved “go one andf the other time” and reached 50 urban centers in 15 countries.

waterjet lowering machine

With the deepening of the construction of the “The Belt as well as the Road”, China’s economic and deal exchanges with countries along The european countries have developed rapidly. Our company has also established deeper ties with American customers. The CHINA RAILWAY Express offers enabled our company’s equipment to get sent to customers faster.

waterjet cutting machine

From 2013 to 2018, the sum of trade volume of goods between China as well as the countries along the “Belt as well as Road” exceeded US$6 trillion. China-Belarus Conventional Park, China-Arab (United Arab Emirates) Capacity Cooperation Park, and China-Ethiopia Monetary and Trade Cooperation Zone own steadily advanced. In terms involving financial services, China has established bilateral currency swap arrangements with a lot more than 20 countries along the way, and established RMB clearing measures with seven countries.

waterjet cutting machine

China and the International Monetary Fund jointly established the capacity building center. By the final of 2018, China’s export credit insurance companies had accumulated more than $600 billion in a plan in the countries along the route.
